name: Disconnect (Hallizzzle)
description:
Rework your brain to figure out how everything moves!

This is a short proof of concept around bending the controls and re-wiring your brain to figure out how to get from A-B.

What looks simple on paper become difficult with every level changing up what you thought you knew.

I'd love to hear so feedback ("and I know there's an issue with level 9, I'm very sorry for that!)

To play: Download and unzip the file. Inside build is a file called "GMTK Game Jam". Open up and enjoy!
